title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2605.4 - Public notice of availability of financial assistance from the fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2605.4 - Public notice of availability of financial assistance from the fund

State Regulations
(a) From time to
time, as determined by the corporation, a public notice shall be issued by the
corporation announcing that the corporation will commence the process of
accepting pre-applications for financial assistance from the fund. Such notice
may include: (1)
the time period during which
pre-applications will be accepted from project sponsors; (2)
the total of fund assistance available
during the funding period; (3)
the
anticipated date that the corporation expects to issue written confirmation to
project sponsors that assistance from the fund is available; and
(4)
such other information that the
corporation may deem necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2605.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
